title: Jungle Wild Birthday Party Thank You Sticker Labels, 40 2" Party Circle Stickers by AmandaCreation, Great for Party Favors, Envelope Seals & Goodie Bags
features: Cuteness Overload: Designed by a talented mom, these colorful stickers feature an adorable elephant, lion, snake, parrot, tiger, zebra, and giraffe! The animal print font will drive you WILD! Amanda Creation. Original design by Amanda Creation

Awesome Quality: Forget smaller, chintzier labels printed on flimsy paper. At 2 inches your Jungle Wild Thank You Stickers are bigger & sturdier than most. Plus, they're printed on 60# stock for ultra quality.

2 inch circle labels are perfect for a variety of uses. You’ll get 40 stickers so there’s plenty to give out to everyone who attends the birthday party. Stick them on goodie bags, party favors, boxes, tags or you can even use them as envelope seals on your thank you cards.

These fun stickers help you coordinate all of the little details for your celebration. Matching invitations and thank you cards are available as well, be sure to get all the matching pieces for a truly beautiful event.

100% Made in the USA: Rest assured you're getting genuine American craftsmanship... from the expert design to the premium cardstock to the full-color, 2-sided printing. 100% Money Back Guarantee, your purchase is Risk Free!
description: *** Bigger... Better... and Best of All... Cuter. Presenting Jungle Wild Birthday Party Sticker Labels Designed by a Mom for Moms. Set of 40 Party Circle Stickers (2" Each) ***

*Perfect to use as envelope seals on your matching thank you cards *Larger 2 " size for bigger visual impact (most others are only 1"-1.5”) *Heftier 60# cardstock with a smooth slightly gloss finish (so it's shiny)
Great for sticking on party favors, goodie bags, boxes or even tags

Your 40 birthday thank you stickers are perfectly sized to stick on envelopes and goodie bags. What's more, you can count on these eye-popping stickers for all-American craftsmanship: They're designed, printed & carefully hand-packaged right here in the USA. To top it off, the labels are fully backed by Amazon's 30-Day Guarantee.
OMG, They're the Absolute Cutest... So Add to Cart Right Away!!
